notesStmt.note: Some leaves damaged. Gaps after folios: 7, 15, 33, 72, 81.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Fragments of Arabic translation and commentaries on the book of Exodus.

collation.p: 10 quires, nos. 6-15, of 10 leaves each. Quires nos. 6, 7, 9, 13-15 are imperfect. Quires nos. 8-15 signed with Hebrew letters on the upper (inner) margin of the first page.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Oriental square and semi-cursive script, partially punctuated, of approximately 14th century.
